name: Truth Or Dare (itch)
description:
This is a Game of Truth Or Dare where you the Player can choose
the Truths and Dares 
You can make it Spicy or you can keep it PG 
it is entirely up to you.

if you want to Change the Truth's or Dare's all you
have to do is open the location where you put the exe
and look for a file called Truths.txt and Dares.txt
and change or add to it then hit save and load the app.
